entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
